name: Sabbar Inc.
description: Developer of a recruitment platform designed to serve the retail and service industries. The company's platform integrates video communications, strategic analytics, and collaborative social technologies into a complete suite of talent management applications, enabling enterprises to boost productivity in managing their candidates and making the right hires.
